record.name: Employee Remote Access
record.description: Employee Remote Access enables subscribers to securely connect to the Intranet through VPN tunnels from remote locations. The service delivers the following components: VPN Client software, authentication hardware (if the user doesn't already have this) and an MCI/UUNET account and dialer for dial-up access using a modem.
record.detailedDescription: Employee Remote Access enables subscribers to securely connect to the Intranet through VPN tunnels from remote locations. The service delivers the following components: VPN Client software, authentication hardware (if the user doesn't already have this) and an MCI/UUNET account and dialer for dial-up access using a modem.
